titleStmt.title: Data Dictionary - Technical Metadata for Digital Still Images

spec.scope: Standardisation and specification of the set of metadata elements for raster digital images

info.p: "This standard defines a set of metadata elements for raster digital images to enable users to develop, exchange, and interpret digital image files. The dictionary has been designed to facilitate interoperability between systems, services, and software as well as to support the long-term management of and continuing access to digital image collections." ANSI/NISO Z39.87, Abstract

analytic.title: Data Dictionary - Technical Metadata for Digital Still Images
